bibl.title: Utopian and Erotic Fusion in a New Elegy by Simonides.
The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire
bibl.author: MACE, Sarah

bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper appeared as: Utopian and Erotic Fusion in a New Elegy by Simonides (22 West2), ZPE 113 (1996) pp. 233-247. - I.E.G. MACE Sarah, Utopian and Erotic Fusion in a New Elegy by Simonides.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 185-207.
